transcription_link: Quantum OOH - Interview - 2025/08/21 13:35 EEST - Notes by Gemini
email_content:
Hello Martin,

I hope you're doing well!

We previously spoke about how Remote Helpers could support SAAGA with specialists. During our last call, we introduced candidates in lead generation, development, and AI engineering.

üìÑ What we shared:

CVs of Archibong, Flourish, and Plamena (lead generators)

Portfolios of Kola and Yaroslav (developers)

Flexible cooperation and pricing options

üìù Have you had a chance to review them? We're happy to answer any questions or clarify details.

Would it be convenient to schedule a quick follow-up call on Wednesday or Thursday at 8:00 AM or 9:00 AM your time? We'd be glad to align on next steps and discuss how to move forward.

Looking forward to your reply!
